Package t10.gamepad.input

Interface GOnToggle<T>

Type Parameters:
T - This type.
All Known Implementing Classes:
GButton
public interface GOnToggle<T>
Represents a toggleable input to the gamepad.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    initialToggleState(boolean toggled)
    Sets the initial toggle state of this GOnToggle.
    boolean
    isToggled()
    Returns whether this is toggled or not.
    T
    onToggle(Consumer<Boolean> withNewState)
    Binds a Runnable to be called when this input is toggled ON OR OFF.
    T
    onToggleOff(Runnable runnable)
    Binds a Runnable to be called when this input is toggled OFF.
    T
    onToggleOn(Runnable runnable)
    Binds a Runnable to be called when this input is toggled ON.

  • Method Details

    • onToggleOn

      T onToggleOn(Runnable runnable)
      Binds a Runnable to be called when this input is toggled ON.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to run when this input is toggled ON.
      Returns:
      This GOnToggle.

    • onToggleOff

      T onToggleOff(Runnable runnable)
      Binds a Runnable to be called when this input is toggled OFF.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to run when this input is toggled OFF.
      Returns:
      This GOnToggle.

    • onToggle

      T onToggle(Consumer<Boolean> withNewState)
      Binds a Runnable to be called when this input is toggled ON OR OFF.
      Parameters:
      withNewState - The Consumer to run when this input is toggled ON OR OFF. The new toggle state is passed to the consumer.
      Returns:
      This GOnToggle.

    • initialToggleState

      T initialToggleState(boolean toggled)
      Sets the initial toggle state of this GOnToggle.
      Parameters:
      toggled - Toggled (true) or not toggled (false)
      Returns:
      This GOnToggle.

    • isToggled

      boolean isToggled()
      Returns whether this is toggled or not.
      Returns:
      Toggled (true) or not toggled (false).
